articles.title: We have 'lost' India and Russia to 'dark china', says Donald Trump
articles.description: U.S. President Donald Trump stated on Friday, September 5, 2025, that India and Russia appear to have been “lost” to China following the Shanghai Cooperation Organisation (SCO) meeting in Tianjin, China. He expressed this sentiment on TruthSocial, along with an old photograph of Prime Minister Narendra Modi, Russian President Vladimir Putin, and Chinese President Xi Jinping. [1]
